DOC.brief_title: Effect Massage Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Americans increasingly seek care massage therapist relief chronic back pain . However , initial study suggest massage beneficial back pain , information many type massage helpful . We conduct study compare two distinct therapeutic massage protocol usual care treat chronic back pain . This study design determine massage protocol effective reduce pain increase functionality people low back pain . 399 Group Health member non-specific low back pain lasting least 3 month randomize one two massage group control group receive treatment beyond usual care . Massage therapist provide participant 10 treatment 10 week . The primary outcome , function bothersomeness low back pain , assess treatment begin 10 , 26 52 week randomization interviewer know treatment participant receive . The result study clarify value two different type massage treat one common , challenging , expensive health problem plague developed country . The finding help physician make informed confident referral , consumer insurer make safe cost-effective choice , massage school make responsible curriculum decision .
DOC.criteria: 20 64 year age member Group Health Cooperative health plan low back pain lasting least 3 month nonmechanical cause back pain ( e.g. , sciatica , systemic/visceral disease , pregnancy , spondylolisthesis , spinal stenosis , cancer , recent vertebral fracture ) inappropriate candidate massage ( active open skin lesion , condition exacerbate increased circulation , recent stroke heart attack , compromise immune system , systemic edema , hypersensitivity touch loss sensation , recent surgery , active contagious infection ) characteristic complicate interpretation finding ( e.g. , involve litigation compensation claim , severe progressive neurological deficit , back surgery within last 3 year , receive back treatment ) unable speak read English massage reason prior 12 month
